product_name: The North Face Surgent Full-Zip Printed Hoodie - Men's
long_description: Just like a favorite sweatshirt, The North Face Surgent Full-Zip Printed Hoodie features a relaxed fit that wraps you in comfort the minute you put it on and includes a subtle screen-print graphic. Soft polyester fleece makes for a comfortable layer that you'll always grab on your way to the gym. Hand pockets provide warmth and storage; hidden media player pocket ensures your tunes can come along. UPF 50+ rating adds to your protection from the sun. The North Face Surgent Full-Zip Printed Hoodie features thumbholes in the cuffs to keep your wrists warm on cool days. Back length of 26 in. Part of The North Face Mountain Athletic line of technical clothing and footwear built to withstand the rigors of sport-specific training by outdoor athletes.
short_description: Just like a favorite sweatshirt, The North Face Surgent Full-Zip Printed Hoodie features a relaxed fit that wraps you in comfort the minute you put it on and includes a subtle screen-print graphic.
